features: Kills 99.9 percent bacteria with 75 percent alcohol content
Fragrance free and quick drying formula
description: Product Description Convenient anti-bacterial hand sanitsier fragrance free gel. Frequent use helps stop the spread of bacteria and viruses. Designed to kill 99.9% of bacteria. Effective alternative to soap and water. Larger bottle size for multi users; ideal for the home, offices, cafe's, sport facilities, restuarants & shops. Founded in 1970 in the Heart of England, Baylis & Harding is a family business which has grown from humble beginnings to become an award winning, international success. Beautifully made, beautifully packaged and beautifully fragranced, Baylis & Harding create gifts that are opened with delight and products to make both you and your home feel more wonderful. Manufacturer Contact Information Nash Road, Redditch, B98 7AS
